programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: After a prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one.

programme.title: Sweet 16
programme.desc: Melissa tries to make friends in her new town, but each of the boys she spends time with is found murdered.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

programme.title: Eat Brains Love
programme.desc: When Jake and his dream girl, Amanda, contract a mysterious zombie virus, they end up on the run from Cass, a teen psychic sent by the government's top-secret Necrotic Control Division to track them down as they search for a cure.

programme.title: The Driller Killer
programme.desc: An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his paintings, and care for his two female roommates, which leads him taking to the streets of New York after dark and randomly killing derelicts with a power drill.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: They Came from Beyond Space
programme.desc: After a team of scientists are dispatched to investigate the remnants of a meteor shower.

programme.title: Deadcon
programme.desc: A group of influencers must unravel the mystery behind a vengeful spirit at the biggest digital event of the year.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak where a series of bizarre and violent �accidents� occur.

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes
programme.desc: The demonic forces that were lurking in Amityville escape to California by inhabiting a lamp.

programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.

programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An 18-foot killer grizzly terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a park ranger to stop the slaughter.
